line_1: E'er slept on Earth's cold bosom, lies asleep.
line_2: Let every Grace and every Virtue weep.

line_1: Let every Grace and every Virtue weep.
line_2: E'er slept on Earth's cold bosom, lies asleep.

line_1: Shall sprinkle on the sod her pearly tears,
line_2: While airy dirges sooth her listening ears.

line_1: While airy dirges sooth her listening ears.
line_2: Shall sprinkle on the sod her pearly tears,

line_1: Shall weeping Fancy leave, and thro' the gloom
line_2: And bend her pensive head o'er LAURA's tomb.

line_1: And bend her pensive head o'er LAURA's tomb.
line_2: Shall weeping Fancy leave, and thro' the gloom

line_1: With silent pace, in sable weeds array'd,
line_2: With trailing torch, advance along the shade,

line_1: With trailing torch, advance along the shade,
line_2: With silent pace, in sable weeds array'd,

line_1: Weav'd by the fingers of the infant Year;
line_2: Oft turns the wishful look, and drops a tear.

line_1: Oft turns the wishful look, and drops a tear.
line_2: Weav'd by the fingers of the infant Year;
